sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaSearch, FaCalendarAlt, FaUsers, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaStar, FaWifi, FaParking, FaSwimmingPool, FaConciergeBell, FaArrowRight, FaBed, FaUtensils, FaCar, FaDumbbell, FaSpa, FaWineGlass, FaShower, FaTv, FaPhone, FaCoffee, FaUmbrellaBeach, FaGamepad } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './HomePage.css'; const HomePage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [searchData, setSearchData] = useState({ destination: '', checkIn: '', checkOut: '', guests: '2', roomType: 'standard' }); const [selectedRoom, setSelectedRoom] = useState(null); const [showBookingModal, setShowBookingModal] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e) => { setSearchData({ ...searchData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Search data:', searchData); // Implement search logic here }; const handleRoomBooking = (room) => { setSelectedRoom(room); setShowBookingModal(true); }; const handleBookingSubmit = (bookingData) => { console.log('Booking submitted:', bookingData); setShowBookingModal(false); alert('Booking request submitted successfully! We will contact you shortly.'); }; // Updated functions for button interactions using React Router const handleExploreDestination = (destinationType) => { switch (destinationType) { case 'Beach': navigate('/destinations/beach'); break; case 'City': navigate('/destinations/city'); break; case 'Mountain': navigate('/destinations/mountain'); break; default: navigate('/rooms'); } }; const handleViewRoomDetails = (room) => { alert(`${room.name} Details:\n\nSize: ${room.size}\nCapacity: Up to ${room.maxGuests} guests\nPrice: $${room.price}/night\n\nFeatures:\n${room.features.join(', ')}\n\n${room.description}`); }; const handleRestaurantReservation = () => { navigate('/restaurant'); }; const handleViewFullMenu = () => { navigate('/restaurant'); }; const handleExploreFacilities = () => { navigate('/facilities'); }; const handleNewsletterSignup = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const email = e.target.email.value; if (email) { alert(`Thank you for subscribing!\n\nEmail: ${email}\n\nYou'll receive exclusive deals and updates from Yasin Heaven Star Hotel.`); e.target.reset(); } }; const rooms = [ { id: 1, name: 'Single Room', type: 'single', price: 80, image: '/assets/Single Bed Pic.jpg', features: ['Free WiFi', 'AC', 'TV', 'Private Bathroom'], description: 'Perfect for solo travelers with all essential amenities.', maxGuests: 1, size: '20 sqm' }, { id: 2, name: 'Deluxe Room', type: 'deluxe', price: 150, image: '/assets/Washroom Dulex.jpg', features: ['Bed', 'Chair', 'Mini Fridge', 'Electric Kettle', 'WiFi', 'Hot Water', 'Electric Ceiling Fan', 'Attach Bath'], description: 'Perfect room with all necessary needs, bed, chair, mini fridge, electric kettle, WiFi, hot water, electric ceiling fan and attach bath.', maxGuests: 2, size: '35 sqm' }, { id: 3, name: 'Master Bedroom Suite', type: 'master', price: 280, image: '/assets/Master .jpg', features: ['Free WiFi', 'AC', 'Smart TV', 'Jacuzzi', 'Balcony', 'Room Service'], description: 'Luxurious suite with separate living area and premium facilities.', maxGuests: 2, size: '60 sqm' }, { id: 4, name: 'Family Room', type: 'family', price: 200, image: '/assets/T1.jpg', features: ['Bed', 'Chair', 'Mini Fridge', 'Electric Kettle', 'WiFi', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Hot Water', 'Attach Bath'], description: 'Perfect room with all necessary needs, bed chair, mini fridge, electric kettle, WiFi, ceiling fan, hot water and attach bath.', maxGuests: 3, size: '45 sqm' }, { id: 5, name: 'Studio Room', type: 'studio', price: 120, image: '/assets/T2.jpg', features: ['Bed', 'Chair', 'Mini Fridge', 'Electric Kettle', 'Hot Water', 'Ceiling Fan', 'WiFi', 'Attach Bath'], description: 'Perfect room with all necessary needs, bed, chair, mini fridge, electric kettle, hot water, ceiling fan, WiFi and attach bath.', maxGuests: 2, size: '30 sqm' } ]; const facilities = [ { icon: , name: 'Swimming Pool', description: 'Outdoor pool with poolside service' }, { icon: , name: 'Restaurant', description: 'Fine dining with international cuisine' }, { icon: , name: 'Fitness Center', description: '24/7 modern gym equipment' }, { icon: , name: 'Spa & Wellness', description: 'Relaxing spa treatments and massage' }, { icon: , name: 'Bar & Lounge', description: 'Premium drinks and cocktails' }, { icon: , name: 'Valet Parking', description: 'Complimentary parking service' }, { icon: , name: '24/7 Concierge', description: 'Round-the-clock guest services' }, { icon: , name: 'Entertainment', description: 'Game room and entertainment center' } ]; const restaurantMenu = [ { category: 'Breakfast', items: [ { name: 'Continental Breakfast', price: 25, description: 'Fresh pastries, fruits, coffee, and juice' }, { name: 'Full English Breakfast', price: 35, description: 'Eggs, bacon, sausages, beans, toast, and coffee' }, { name: 'Healthy Bowl', price: 28, description: 'Granola, yogurt, fresh berries, and honey' } ] }, { category: 'Lunch & Dinner', items: [ { name: 'Grilled Salmon', price: 45, description: 'Fresh Atlantic salmon with vegetables' }, { name: 'Beef Tenderloin', price: 55, description: 'Premium cut with truffle sauce' }, { name: 'Vegetarian Pasta', price: 32, description: 'Fresh pasta with seasonal vegetables' }, { name: 'Chef\'s Special', price: 48, description: 'Daily special created by our head chef' } ] } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Animated background elements */}
⭐ Premium Hotel Experience

Welcome to Yasin Heaven Star Hotel
Premium Hospitality Experience

Discover luxury hotels and unforgettable experiences worldwide. Your perfect stay awaits.

{/* Enhanced Search Card */}
{/* About Section */}
About Us

Yasin Heaven Star Hotel

Perfectly located at the center of Yasin Valley, Yasin Heaven Star Hotel offers guests with an experience that attract them to visit again and again. Whether you are traveling in a group or individually with a small or large budget, Yasin Heaven Star Hotel offers accommodation for everyone in a truly peaceful and relaxing environment.

Prime Location

Center of Yasin Valley

For Everyone

Group or Individual Travel

All Budgets

Small to Large Budget Options

Peaceful Environment

Truly Relaxing Experience

{/* Location Section */}
Our Location

Location of Yasin Heaven Star Hotel

Yasin Heaven Star Hotel is located at the center Yasin, just a 64 km away from the Gahkuch the headqurater of Ghizer Valley. It is just 40 min drive from Gupis Valley. Yasin Heaven Star Hotel offers guests with an experience that attract them to visit again and again. Whether you are traveling in a group or individually with a small or large budget, Yasin Heaven Star Hotel offers accommodation for everyone in a truly peaceful and relaxing environment.

Central Yasin Location

Located at the heart of Yasin Valley for easy access to all attractions

64 km from Gahkuch

Just 64 km away from Gahkuch, the headquarters of Ghizer Valley

40 min from Gupis Valley

Convenient 40-minute drive from the beautiful Gupis Valley

Perfect Access Point

Ideal location for exploring the natural beauty of the region

{/* Destinations Section */}
Explore Destinations

Popular Destinations

From bustling cities to serene beaches, discover your perfect getaway

🏖️ Beach

Beach Destinations

Discover perfect hotels for your next warm-weather vacation with seaside escapes

🏙️ City

City Hotels

Experience urban luxury with our premium city hotels in major metropolitan areas

🏔️ Mountain

Mountain Resorts

Retreat to serene mountain resorts for the perfect blend of adventure and relaxation

{/* Rooms Section */}
🏨 Our Rooms

Choose Your Perfect Stay

From cozy single rooms to luxurious suites, find the perfect accommodation for your needs

24/7 Customer Service

Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist you with any questions or concerns, ensuring a seamless experience.

Best Price Guarantee

We guarantee the lowest prices on hotel bookings. Find a better deal elsewhere? We'll match it and beat it by 5%.

Premium Amenities

Enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, parking, pool access, and many other premium amenities at our carefully selected partner hotels.

Subscribe to our newsletter and be the first to know about special deals, new destinations, and insider travel tips.

Join 50,000+ travelers who trust us for the best hotel deals. Unsubscribe anytime.

{/* Booking Modal */} {showBookingModal && selectedRoom && (
setShowBookingModal(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

Book {selectedRoom.name}

{selectedRoom.name}

${selectedRoom.price}/night

{selectedRoom.size} • Up to {selectedRoom.maxGuests} guests

{ e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(e.target); const bookingData = { room: selectedRoom, guestName: formData.get('guestName'), email: formData.get('email'), phone: formData.get('phone'), checkIn: formData.get('checkIn'), checkOut: formData.get('checkOut'), guests: formData.get('guests'), specialRequests: formData.get('specialRequests') }; handleBookingSubmit(bookingData); }}>
Total Cost (1 night): ${selectedRoom.price}
* Final price will be calculated based on your stay duration
)}
); }; export default HomePage;
